name: places/ChIJMQ0sJehbwokRKs6StfU413A
formattedAddress: 185 Greenwich St LL5140, New York, NY 10007, USA
adrFormatAddress: 185 Greenwich St LL5140, New York, NY 10007, USA

editorialSummary.text: Retailer of fashion & sport sunglasses, including options from luxury brands.

originalText.text:
I recently organized a private event at Solstices, where I brought along clients to shop for sunglasses. I must say that my experience was nothing short of exceptional, and it was largely thanks to Eric, one of the store's dedicated team members.

Eric went above and beyond to ensure that our event ran smoothly. He helped me set up the area for our private event, making sure everything was in place for a seamless shopping experience.

What truly stood out, however, was Eric's impeccable customer service. He was not only friendly and welcoming but also incredibly knowledgeable about the sunglasses they had in stock. He took the time to assist each of my clients personally, offering valuable insights and feedback to help them select the perfect pair of sunglasses.

His patience and attention to detail were truly remarkable. He made the shopping experience enjoyable and stress-free for everyone involved. It's clear that Eric is passionate about what he does, and his dedication to providing top-notch service was evident throughout our visit.

I can't express enough how grateful I am to Eric and the entire team at Solstices for making our event a success. Their commitment to customer satisfaction is truly commendable. I look forward to returning to Solstices for future shopping experiences, knowing that I'll receive the same level of outstanding service.

If you're in search of not only stylish sunglasses but also an exceptional shopping experience, I highly recommend visiting Solstices and seeking out Eric. You won't be disappointed!

originalText.text: We waited over an hour during open hours; sign on door says be back in 15 minutes but worker never appeared. Super frustrating experience and awful customer service.

text.text: We waited over an hour during open hours; sign on door says be back in 15 minutes but worker never appeared. Super frustrating experience and awful customer service.

originalText.text: Says open at 11am but shop was closed at 1130am with no sign of anyone in the store.

text.text: Says open at 11am but shop was closed at 1130am with no sign of anyone in the store.
